statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions, interaction_type FROM user_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'view' GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_interactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE device_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) as total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 123456;
SELECT device_name, device_type, connection_status FROM connected_devices WHERE connection_status = TRUE;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM connected_devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND interaction_type = 'comment';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM connected_devices WHERE connection_status = TRUE ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 5 AND interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 10 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, device_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND interaction_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT device_id, device_name, last_interaction_date FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'tablet' ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, registration_date FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name, last_interaction_date FROM devices ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users u JOIN user_interactions ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id WHERE ui.interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type='click' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE device_type='mobile' AND manufacturer='Apple';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions_log GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 10 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT MAX(interaction_timestamp) FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id=123;
SELECT u.username, d.device_name FROM users u JOIN devices d ON u.user_id = d.device_id;
SELECT * FROM interactions_log ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_information;
SELECT name, email FROM user_information ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT device_id, model, os_version FROM device_information WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE action = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, notification_enabled, language FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_enabled = true;
SELECT * FROM user_information WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM user_information WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT model, os_version, manufacturer FROM device_information WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 4 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, message, timestamp FROM notification_history WHERE message LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
